website_summaries.verdict: Multi-functional, intuitive stopwatch and clock with a long battery life and a large display. Best for light duty timing needs.
pros: Ergonomic design for different hand sizes
Water resistant casing for pool use

customer_reviews.title: The stopwatch works great. All of the complaints about the alarm and ...
customer_reviews.text: The stopwatch works great. All of the complaints about the alarm and chime sounds are easily rectified by turning the alarm and chime off. I have attached a tip sheet on how to disable both the alarm and the chime.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Solid performing stopwatches and reasonably priced too
customer_reviews.text: Bought these (12 units) for our rec swim team to replace stopwatches that were showing their age and wear. We use these for our Timers to hand record each racer's time as a backup to our digital automated system. These timers have substantial functionality, are easy to use, with clear and easy to read displays. The buttons are correctly sized for an assortment of hand sizes. We plan to get a few years use out of these and it looks like they'll hold up well to water and chlorine conditions. Well priced and good quality, these stopwatches are a win.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet alarm
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is quieter than the alarms on the watches I've had from other brands, so sometimes I don't hear it. The large size of the clock numbers is nice. I don't have to put on my glasses to read it. Like all brands of this type of watch, when they get old they start to malfunction. After this one woke me up at midnight when I didn't have it set for that, I decided to abandon it and just use my phone. This was two months after buying it. It also will sometimes alarm five minutes after I set the alarm. For example at 9:00 I set it for 9:30, it goes off at 9:05, but not at 9:30.
customer_reviews.author: JON KING

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is so easy to use! And I'm using it in a tough gardening chore where it is often wet. And it just sloughs off the water. It's easy to set, easy enough to use with one hand, it's a good size that I would imagine makes it universal usage. It always reverts back to the time of day when not in use. Super price. Great Seller.
customer_reviews.author: P Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: A decent stopwatch, resists water.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good water resistant stopwatch. Water resistant. Not water proof, as now mine has fog on the inside. Also, trying to get the alarm to stop coming up is interesting once you've chucked the instructions. Actually, the instructions are online, if I remember correctly, but I'm usually not near a computer when I have the watch, or when I'm near my computer or phone, I don't have the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Dana

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating random alarm and beeping.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for a simple, inexpensive stop watch. What I didn't buy (or intend to buy) was a random alarm clock, going off at 4am, 1am and/or beeping in the middle of the day, etc. I'm too frustrated with it to even deal with trying to press a million buttons to turn it off or even keeping it around to return it. If you want something simple, this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Valla D

customer_reviews.title: Good but makes noise
customer_reviews.text: Good stopwatch. It beeps when you stop and start it which can be distracting depending on what you are using it for. So if you're looking for a quiet stopwatch, this ain't it. But it does all the things a stopwatch is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: With all the choices of stopwatches, I chose this one because it looked good and it fell in the level of not the most expensive and not the cheapest. I asked the company a question regarding the battery ( which will last about two years and can be replaced by removing four screws in the back and buying a common new battery) and received a detailed response the next day. The stopwatch is working well and I really like the display.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Delong

customer_reviews.title: It was a bit difficult to figure out at first ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit difficult to figure out at first and the website for the manual was "unavailable," but finally found out how to work it. Works well as a basic stopwatch however, you cannot turn it off. I find this very frustrating and wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Time is fleeting...
customer_reviews.text: The ProCoach Sports Stopwatch Timer RS-013 came nicely packed in a small box filled with some form fitting soft foam. There is an instruction sheet, written in English, that thoroughly explains how to set the functions. Easy peasy! I use the stopwatch every morning to time my 2 mile walk. I write down the time and on the following day, I pick up the pace and shave off a few more seconds. Seems like a good plan. I think i am starting to gain weight.
customer_reviews.author: duff

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: The watch stopped working after a few uses. Now I cannot switch to stopwatch mode it stays stuck in clock mode and the center button does not do anything when pressed. Update: I banged it very, very hard on the lab bench a few times and now the button works. Hopefully will stay working.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: cheap and cheap
customer_reviews.text: The website advertised with it does not work for getting the manual. Also, this thing does not turn off. Made in China and all plastic. For the price, about what you would expect!
customer_reviews.author: MAMUTE'S TRADE SUPPLIES

customer_reviews.title: No user manual provided or online
customer_reviews.text: No user manual is provided. Instead you are provided a card with a URL to visit to download a user manual. The URL is not active. In the product answer this issue comes up. The alternative URL for a user manual is alse=o inactive. Amazon should pull this product from its listings.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. inexpensive. annoying beep has been unstoppable. every 30-60 minutes. UPdate: look in FAQ and the answer is there. press start/stop button followed by Split/reset button and everything is fine. battery is great and the functionality is as simple as it gets. I use for VB tryouts and it's been easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Springfield VA Dad

customer_reviews.title: I threw it directly in the garbage. It would have been a waste of time ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery died two weeks, I repeat two weeks after receiving it. I threw it directly in the garbage. It would have been a waste of time to wrap it and then drive to the post office. I guess I'll just eat the cost.
customer_reviews.author: L A  Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: What? How? and to change the time to my zone?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me. But I think that it would have been great to have some instructions included in the box. I don't care how simple anything may appear to any individual, it's just a good measure to provide instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Hunnee

customer_reviews.title: This stop watch is good. It has 3 different modes
customer_reviews.text: This stop watch is good. It has 3 different modes: Clock, Stopwatch, and Alarm. Keep in mind there is no on/off switch so it stays on all day, but the batteries will last a long time so don't worry. The buttons are very easy to press so be careful when you take it out of your pocket during a workout cuz you might stop the lap or the time you have going. Other than that, it a quality stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy- not “PRO”.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. This is a cheap plastic stopwatch that the lanyard broke day one. Because it is flimsy- it’s hard to get the feedback needed for timing accuracy. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Definitely worth the money. Works well, very easy to use. You have to download the manual, and it takes some patience to figure out the modes, but once you, it's easy. Large, fits in the palm of an adult hand. Easy to read the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: leo lepore

customer_reviews.title: Speed demon
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift . Being waterproof was great as he raced his dog around the yard rain or shine. Numbers were easy to see and buttons large enough and spaced out enough for small fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: MSF rider coach uses this for student evaluations
customer_reviews.text: Work great, very intuitive. I am an MSF rider coach and I use it for skills evaluation for motorcycle students. Functions flawlessly every time. Great deal. If it's not intuitive enough for you, the user manual is online. It's really easy to figure out. Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: IronYuppie

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable to grip
customer_reviews.text: As a Coach, finding a quality stop watch is important to me and I find that the ProCoach Sport stop watch is exactly what I was looking for. It's comfortable to grip, the buttons function nicely and I don't get the missed button depresses I used to get with lesser stop watches i have used in the past. Split times are easy, Alarm is nice along with the hourly chimes (you can turn this function off, if not needed, but I find it handy). Oh, and the numbers in the display are LARGE, perfect for my imperfect eyesight.
customer_reviews.author: Mgood

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased to find that it is pretty intuitive
customer_reviews.text: I picked this stopwatch because it is water resistant, while some others are not. I am pleased to find that it is pretty intuitive. The essential instructions are on the inside cover of the box and take all of 5 short paragraphs. This one cost me $10, but I find that the price is now up $4 just a few days later. It works. It has the split timer. It is fairly simple. Does everything I expect of a stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: It's not necessarily a bad stopwatch.
customer_reviews.text: It's not necessarily a bad stopwatch... but, it doesn't shut up. It does not have an option to switch off the sound for pressing buttons. It also beeps on its own every hour and there is no way to disable that either. So it's only great if you have a gym locker you can keep it stored away at if you can't stand hearing it go off every hour.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use stop watch
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and accurate. Easy to use. Just what my husband was looking for. Not at all complicated. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this stop watch to take data on my autistic clients. It is a great product in general and the stopwatch works perfectly. The size is just right too, not too small and not too big. I have not had any issues and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: which can be good. Difficult to set
customer_reviews.text: This stop watch goes off randomly no matter what setting it is on. I often hear it in bed while I am sleeping. It is loud, which can be good. Difficult to set.
customer_reviews.author: Jaia

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT! Repeated times good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Stop watch on Friday. Received an email with an attached instruction pdf from Saberhead on Saturday. Received the stop watch on Sunday, (Amazon Prime). Set up watch per instructions. Timed machines at work on Tuesday. Worked GREAT! Repeated times good! Thank you Saberhead! GREAT Service and Product! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kid

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: waste of money and the company charges $5.99 to ship it back to them....
customer_reviews.author: Seth H.

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Good quality. Is not made to shut off entirely because it is has a watch function. manufacturer (Saberhead) states power draw is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: GaryB

customer_reviews.title: A good choice.
customer_reviews.text: There were many choices of stop watches to choose from and I am convinced that I made the best choice. I'm glad I purchased two extras for Christmas presents. My only complaint is that I wish there had been a little instruction booklet that came in the box with the stop watch.
customer_reviews.author: purrkz

customer_reviews.title: A little confusing of how to reset but maybe that's because I use this like once a
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose. A little confusing of how to reset but maybe that's because I use this like once a year
customer_reviews.author: Taisa Boiko

customer_reviews.title: Stopwatch functions worked fine, but this product is not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Stopwatch functions worked fine, but this product is not water resistant. I use it around a pool with no direct contact with water and it still broke within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Breitling

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the proce
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. Price is kept low because you download the manual instead of having a printed one, which I prefer. Now I need to go online and find out how to turn it off. But does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Coudrain

customer_reviews.title: Extremely limited and not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Well, it works, but the functions are terribly limited. Modes are not clearly defined, and there is no countdown timer. but, technically, it works. I don't think there is a way to go through your laps, either...
customer_reviews.author: TerryTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is exactly what I needed! Extra long lanyard and large digital display. I use this on a daily basis for my baseball training and can not think of one bad thing to say about it. Great product for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: justbombs

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 8 year old grandson. He received many gifts more expensive but the one and his 15 friends played with most was the stopwatch with a variety running games. It turned out to be the best gift ever. Easy to setup and to use. All the kids loved it and wanted one for themselves. Try it you won't regret it. Great for kids as well as adults!.
customer_reviews.author: Don McNair

customer_reviews.title: Need written manual!
customer_reviews.text: Love how big the numbers are,yet I don't like that you have to go to the website to get instructions for it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Good for swimming or track
customer_reviews.text: Works like a stop watch but the neck piece is to short
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bad design for regular use
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the cord comes out easily. Bad design
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Goulding

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use stop watch
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use stop watch! Got it working already with the correct time even! I can't figure out how to turn off the alarm but it's always in another room so I don't care. Perfect use when I count off for my exercising. I definitely recommend it! Not expensive and easy to use. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with this purchase and would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Item(s) arrived safe and on time. I'm satisfied with this purchase and would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product/tool for sports coaches at all levels!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Light, easy to program,just the right number of functions for coaches -- football, field and track, swimming. Completely satisfied -- use it daily!! Great price!! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Augusta

customer_reviews.title: Gave 4 as gifts to trainers I work with. ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave 4 as gifts to trainers I work with. . . you'd have thought I gave them a Rolex! They were very excited. . .and the stopwatches work just as they should!
customer_reviews.author: DHHDHH

customer_reviews.title: but it would be nice if it had lasted a lot longer
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch worked for about 1 semester and no longer does. I still use it as a prop, but it would be nice if it had lasted a lot longer!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good stop watch
customer_reviews.text: Durable stop watch; purchased as a replacement. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G

customer_reviews.title: Better than thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, easy to operate, I believe it is better than described and easy function. Got the item early and also received PDF manual early also. Was prepped for the stopwatch when it arrived. Thanks Saberhead for the great deal and item.
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stopwatch most days for track practice; it is really handy! It is very generic as it supports time, date, and most generally the stopwatch. I don't use the alarm feature at all, but I suppose such a feature wouldn't hurt. Overall, this is great for what it offers.
customer_reviews.author: OC

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a five.. just received product yesterday, which by the way, was delivered early! Everything set per instructions... looks great.. nice big display... exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool with a comfortable natural feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool with a comfortable natural feel. Smooth button action. Kinda tricky to program some features so I chose not program them. It's a good stopwatch which is what I wanted. Hangs comfortably around neck and is not a bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Bill

customer_reviews.title: I just didn't like the price on those
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it must still need to set the time and date. I do wish it was a bit heavier. I really wanted the old school type from when I was in High school... 1974-1978 lol! I just didn't like the price on those! lol...
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy build
customer_reviews.text: Nylon Cord was glued into each end of little tube on top of stopwatch. Cord fell out. Stop Watch gone. Still have cord though. Bummer! It was a cool stopwatch though.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett J. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this stopwatch for my husband and he absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stopwatch for my husband and he absolutely loves it.He uses it every day and raves about it.The quality is top notch and ,if this one ever wears out of if anyone I know needs one,i will definitely purchase it from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Lomino

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fair price
customer_reviews.text: This is much more than a stop watch. It gives me the time and date also and is sturdy and will take abuse related to sports. The digits can be seen at a quick glance; they are larger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: PBJ

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the watch
customer_reviews.text: I selected this stop watch over all the rest because of the design and large face. I think it is important to be able to really see the clock. I am very happy with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple instructions. Easy to set the time and use. Ergonomic design. Accurate. Good appearance and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Stan57Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Product looks well made and it held up in this weekend's rain. I still need to read the manual to fully understand what this stop watch can and cannot do. But overall a good buy, thanks
customer_reviews.author: mopson

customer_reviews.title: Nice stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Nice stopwatch, although I sometimes have a problem getting the number back to zero! I'll give it the benefit of the doubt and say it's my problem, though, and not the watch's, because otherwise I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: melnyc

customer_reviews.title: Great timer
customer_reviews.text: Great stopwatch timer! I mainly use it for timing battery charge for my quad-copter flight time.
customer_reviews.author: PatriotFan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It may serve the purpose indoors; but it is cheaply made and NOT resistant to rain.
customer_reviews.author: John Kimbrell

customer_reviews.title: quality stop watch
customer_reviews.text: very accurate with the times that are recorded, for the price you cant beat it!!!
customer_reviews.author: JENIFER CROSSLEY

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time/money.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give negative stars. I got the item and it did not work from the start. It was a waste of time/money and I want my money back! DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS GARBAGE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Lapid

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but it is not able to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but it is not able to keep track of more that one stopwatch time. I expected it be able to record each lap time individually but it can't.
customer_reviews.author: smith256985494

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size, fits in my large hands with no problems, and has a nice big display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap build quality and confusing function.More Chinese junk for the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Stopwatch, very good service.
customer_reviews.text: Larger display than most I have used, nice for older eyes. The folks at Saberhead went out of their way to make sure everything was OK and sent a pdf copy of the instructions even before I received the stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Guy A. Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Easy to use and operate. Does not look or feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Dear Saberhead . This is the best Stopwatch i have ever used ! Very easy to operate . Easy to understand instructions . Thank you very much . Mr Perry
customer_reviews.author: James Perry

customer_reviews.title: This is second one. They both come with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is second one.They both come with a timer pre set that I can not turn off. The first one got throw out, this one is on the way out. I am going back to buying in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No user manual
customer_reviews.text: No manual or instructions. Contained a card with web address to download manual. Website is down.
customer_reviews.author: drjones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive for a cheap stopwatch. I do not suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: sAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stopwatch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stop watch because I coach my daughter's soccer team. This was extremely easy to use and made my life as a coach much easier when keeping track of time and subbing the girls into the game. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this stopwatch. It has a large display and it's very easy to figure out the different functions. I have an Endless Pool that has a display that indicates how fast you are swimming per 100 yards. I time my intervals, and that allows me to calculate how far I swam. The stopwatch is waterproof and was exactly what I wanted. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz TWTX

customer_reviews.title: Works great, buttons easy to press, no sticking
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over 8 months, and it still works great. Buttons are easy to press and they never stick.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Laynard was unraveled upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Would have been OK if the lanyard wasn't tore into! Had to burn it and thread it back thru, tie a knot to be able to wear it around my neck..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, they made it difficult to understand how to use all the settings though.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT STOPWATCH FOR COACHES AND ATHLETES
customer_reviews.text: GREAT STOPWATCH Perfect for use as a high school swim coach. Milton-functions include split tie intervals. Durable and water resistant. Good quality and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read - but it bugs me that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read - but it bugs me that I cannot turn it off. Mfg claims is a watch - but its not a watch. Have to take it apart to change batteries.
customer_reviews.author: William J Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Broker after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: I use this stopwatch when I am in the shower so it is important its waterproof. It broker after a month. The digits on the screen are scrambled and illegible.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore A.

customer_reviews.title: there is no way to shut the ting off. ...
customer_reviews.text: there is no way to shut the ting off. Also it is way to complex.I just want to time the race not see the date and time ect.keep it simple.
customer_reviews.author: john billings

customer_reviews.title: Just like the stopwatches we use at our swim meets
customer_reviews.text: The directions were pretty spare, but if you play around with the buttons it's more or less intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J. Toops

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch definitely gave me the competitive edge that I needed coaching 4-year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: The last stopwatch you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a ton of stopwatches. The display is too small, the battery dies, etc. I bought this stopwatch over a year ago and it is going strong. I can read the display and I have dropped the thing so many times and it has survived without any damage. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good stopwatch. Buttons are crisp and respond well. No countdown timer (didn't need one but I see this question a lot). Very courteous and responsive customer service
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, my grandson loves it! He's using it to time running a specific distance.
customer_reviews.author: NaniX4

customer_reviews.title: Watch set-up
customer_reviews.text: Need more instructions on set up and use especially date/ time. Follow-up---- Saberhead responded immediately and I would not hesitate to place and order with Saberhead Good work
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hryn

customer_reviews.title: everything else was pretty intuitive. I amanxious to actually use it at ...
customer_reviews.text: It only took a few minutes to learn how to set the time, etc. everything else was pretty intuitive. I amanxious to actually use it at a real sporting event.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: The stop watch I bought was well made, accurate and easy to set up and use. Packaging was amazing. I would absolutely recommend this product to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Schmelz

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: This product is light, sturdy and does exactly what I need it to do. I am a bit stop watch challenged, but the directions helped me along.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch and so far so good
customer_reviews.text: very nice watch and hope that they perform as well as they look. I hope to get more than one swim season out of them
customer_reviews.author: David Listerman

customer_reviews.title: Stopwatch works fine, but I've had the stopwatch for 3 days ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopwatch works fine, but I've had the stopwatch for 3 days and the strap already broke. Extremely cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: broken on arrival. unit rattles and mode button doesn't work. annoying quality control sticker on back.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stopwatch for the price. We use them in our Spinning classes to time certain exercises and they work perfectly. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Suncat

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience/Service on this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described ahead of expected/promised time. Very pleased with product and over all service. Highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Greatwatch for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for a great price. Love how the buttons don't stick. I have to time people a lot and this is so easy to use and I love how touchy the buttons are.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Sugimoto

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch was horrible I came timing and never showed other functions and then it just died
customer_reviews.author: Cameia S Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, has all the functions I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: BigBen7

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat it for the price. It's slightly larger than I thought it would be. Instructions on use are clear.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Hosler

customer_reviews.title: If it was just a stopwatch minus the clock and alarm I would be just ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. If it was just a stop watch minus the clock and alarm I would be just as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lounsbury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little sports watch, timer, alarm. it just works and works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams
